test.name: 🔍 All CRUD API Tests (Create + Get + Update + Delete)

test-method.name: testDeletePostWithInvalidId_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 🔴 Delete post with invalid ID should return 404

test-method.name: testDeletePostWithoutAuthToken_ShouldReturnUnauthorizedOrNotFound
test-method.description: 🔴 Delete post without authorization token should return 401 or 404

test-method.name: testDeletePostTwice_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 🔴 Deleting same post again should return 404

test-method.name: testUpdateUser_InvalidEmail_ShouldReturn422
test-method.description: 🔴 Update user with invalid email format

test-method.name: testCreatePost_ShouldSucceed
test-method.description: 🟢 Create post for a valid user

test-method.name: testDeleteCommentAgain_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 🔴 Deleting already deleted comment should return 404

test-method.name: testGetAllUsers_ShouldReturnUserList
test-method.description: 🟢 Fetch all users - Should return 200 and at least one user

test-method.name: testGetSingleUser_InvalidId_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 🔴 Fetch single user by invalid ID - Should return 404

test-method.name: testGetSingleUser_ValidId_ShouldReturnUser
test-method.description: 🟢 Fetch single user by valid ID - Should return 200

test-method.name: testUpdatePostWithEmptyPayload_ShouldReturn422
test-method.description: 🔴 Update post with empty payload should return 422

test-method.name: testUpdatePostWithInvalidId_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 🔴 Update with invalid post ID should return 404

test-method.name: testUpdatePostWithoutAuthToken_ShouldReturn401or404
test-method.description: 🔴 Update post without auth token should return 401 or 404

test-method.name: testDeleteUser_Twice_ShouldReturn404OnSecondAttempt
test-method.description: 🔴 Delete same user twice - Second attempt should return 404

test-method.name: testGetAllCommentsForPost_ShouldReturnList
test-method.description: 🟢 Get all comments for a post

test-method.name: testGetCommentByInvalidId_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 🔴 Get comment with invalid ID should return 404

test-method.name: testInvalidToken_ShouldReturn401
test-method.description: 🔴 Accessing API with invalid token returns 401

test-method.name: testMissingToken_ShouldReturn401Or404
test-method.description: 🔴 Accessing API without token returns 401 or 404
